vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.9.8;
son of: Haman (H2001);
brother of: Parshandatha (H6577), Dalphon (H1813), Aspatha (H0630), Poratha (H6334), Aridatha (H0743), Parmashta (H6534), Arisai (H0747), Aridai (H0742) and Vaizatha (H2055)
§ Adalia = "I shall be drawn up of Jah"
fifth son of Haman, executed at same time
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞大利雅
1) 哈曼的第五個兒子, 同時被處死 (斯 9:8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚大利雅
1) 哈曼的第五个儿子, 同时被处死 (斯 9:8)
